# AVAudioSession.MicrophoneInjectionMode.spokenAudio

**Case**

A mode that indicates to inject spoken audio, like synthesized speech, along with microphone audio.

## Declaration

```swift
case spokenAudio
```

## Microphone injection modes

- **AVAudioSession.MicrophoneInjectionMode.none**: A mode that indicates not to use spoken audio injection.

items.description: A mode that indicates not to use spoken audio injection.
